title: Data Insights Consultant
description:
InsightFlow Analytics Seeks Data Insights Consultant (Full-Time)

InsightFlow Analytics, a leading consultancy in London, transforms raw data into strategic insights for clients across finance, retail, and logistics. We’re excited to welcome a Data Insights Consultant to lead our analytics team and deliver transformative solutions.

About the Role
As a Team Leader, you’ll guide analysts in designing analytics solutions that drive client decisions. Your expertise will shape how businesses leverage data to achieve their goals.

Your Responsibilities

  • Oversee analytics projects using SQL, Tableau, and Python.
    - Develop custom dashboards to visualize KPIs.
    - Collaborate with clients to define analytics goals.
    - Mentor junior analysts to enhance their skills.
    - Ensure GDPR compliance in data handling.
    - Build predictive models for forecasting.
    - Stay ahead of analytics trends.
    - Present insights to C-level stakeholders.
    - Manage project timelines and resources.
    - Contribute to thought leadership initiatives.

Qualifications Needed
We’re looking for candidates with 4–6 years of experience in data analytics or consulting, proficient in SQL, Tableau, Python, or R. Strong leadership and mentoring skills are essential, along with GDPR knowledge. Excellent communication and presentation abilities are required. A Bachelor’s degree in data science, statistics, or a related field is necessary.

Why InsightFlow?
We foster a culture of innovation and collaboration. Our flexible work model supports remote and in-office work, prioritizing work-life balance. We offer continuous learning through certifications and conferences, and access to premium analytics tools. You’ll work on impactful projects in an inclusive environment.

Benefits
Private healthcare plan
Pension contributions
25 days of annual leave
Learning and development budget
Access to analytics platforms
Team-building events

Lead with Insight
Join InsightFlow Analytics and shape the future of data-driven decisions. Apply now!

#InsightFlowCareers #DataAnalytics #Leadership #HiringNow
